sources.name: EntreeEHS
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> EntreeEHS

typeProperties.script:

		OrgCm as string,
		CDis as string,
		Article as string,
		Description as string,
		{Hiérarch.groupe} as string,
		{Hiérarch.locale} as string,
		Predecessor as string,
		Successor as string,
		St as string,
		{Désignation Statut} as string,
		{Déb. val.} as string

	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> articleHierarchie

		{Hiérarch.produits} as string,
		{Désignation} as string

	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> detailArticleHierarchie
articleHierarchie derive({N1.groupe} = substring({Hiérarch.groupe}, 1, 2),
		{N2.groupe} = substring({Hiérarch.groupe}, 3, 1),
		{N3.groupe} = substring({Hiérarch.groupe}, 4, 1),
		{N4.groupe} = substring({Hiérarch.groupe}, 5, 1),
		{N5.groupe} = substring({Hiérarch.groupe}, 6, 1),
		{N6.groupe} = substring({Hiérarch.groupe}, 7, 1),
		{N7.groupe} = substring({Hiérarch.groupe}, 8, 3)) ~> splitGroupe

		{N2.locale} = substring({Hiérarch.locale}, 3, 1),
		{N3.locale} = substring({Hiérarch.locale}, 4, 1),

	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> N1GroupeDesignation

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared afctationflows = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.BlobContents("https://dsvaillantfr.blob.core.windows.net/data-warehouse/Temp/atc_affectation_lower"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared atcc2021 = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.BlobContents("https://dsvaillantfr.blob.core.windows.net/data-warehouse/Temp/atc_c2021_lower"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = afctationflows,
  #"Choose columns" = Table.SelectColumns(Source, {"Clé Référentiel", "Marque", "Code Postal début", "Code Postal fin", "Utilisateur", "Fonction", "Département", "DR"})
in
  #"Choose columns";

		{Clé Référentiel} as string,
